verbs.description: scrutinize (third-person singular simple present scrutinizes, present participle scrutinizing, simple past and past participle scrutinized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To examine something with great care or detail, as to look for hidden or obscure flaws.
examples: to scrutinize the conduct or motives of individuals

entries.meaning: (transitive) To audit accounts etc in order to verify them.
